title:
On an integrable discretization of the massive Thirring model in
  light-cone coordinates and the associated Yang-Baxter map
abstract:
We propose a fully discrete analog of the massive Thirring model in
light-cone coordinates by constructing its Lax-pair representation. This
Lax-pair representation can also be used to define a new Yang-Baxter map, so we
obtain a Yang-Baxter map that admits a continuous limit. We present most of the
results for the general case where the dependent variables are matrix-valued.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
